price: (19) It will be only one shout, and at once they will be observing.
arabic: فَإِنَّمَا هِيَ زَجۡرَةٞ وَٰحِدَةٞ فَإِذَا هُمۡ يَنظُرُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: fa-innamā hiya zajratun wāḥidatun fa-idhā hum yanẓurūna
